title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. N, pt. 185 - Records Of Public Corporations

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§207, 2590-e, 4410; Arts and Cultural Affairs Law, §§57.05, 57.17, 57.19, 57.21, 57.23, 57.25, 57.29, 57.33, 57.35; L. 1992, ch. 705

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. § 185.1 - Definitions
